Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.description: Taunts surrounding targets, applying maximum threat to them, and decreases their defense stat.

ranks.description: Taunts surrounding targets, applying maximum threat to them, and decreases their defense stat.

Spread_Shot.name: Spread Shot
Spread_Shot.description:
Fires a spread of projectiles, dealing 
$DMG damage twice.

ranks.description:
Fires a spread of projectiles, dealing 
$DMG damage twice.

Siphon_Leech.name: Siphon Leech
Siphon_Leech.description: Shoots a siphoning projectile that spawns eldritch leeches on the hit target, healing the caster as they deal damage.

ranks.description: Shoots a siphoning projectile that spawns eldritch leeches on the hit target, healing the caster as they deal damage.

Leg_Up.name: Leg Up
Leg_Up.description: Grants a movement speed increase buff, additionally increasing evasion.

ranks.description: Grants a movement speed increase buff, additionally increasing evasion.

Talus.name: Talus
Talus.description: Summons a massive boulder, smashing it into the ground, causing knockback. Deals $DMG earth damage.

ranks.description: Summons a massive boulder, smashing it into the ground, causing knockback. Deals $DMG earth damage.

Aquos.name: Aquos
Aquos.description: Casts a torrent of freezing water in front of the caster, dealing $DMG water damage.

ranks.description: Casts a torrent of freezing water in front of the caster, dealing $DMG water damage.

Inner_Focus.name: Inner Focus
Inner_Focus.description: Provides a buff that guarantees a 100% Critical Strike chance for the next attack.

ranks.description: Provides a buff that guarantees a 100% Critical Strike chance for the next attack.

Recovery.name: Recovery
Recovery.description: Applies a healing condition that restores health over time.

ranks.description: Applies a healing condition that restores health over time.

Recall.name: Recall
Recall.description: Recalls the player back to Sanctum, spawning a portal to return where the caster recalled from. Can only cast outside of Sanctum.

ranks.description: Recalls the player back to Sanctum, spawning a portal to return where the caster recalled from. Can only cast outside of Sanctum.

Curis.name: Curis
Curis.description: Instantly heals the caster and nearby allies by $DMG.

ranks.description: Instantly heals the caster and nearby allies by $DMG.

Crya.name: Crya
Crya.description: Casts multiple ice needles, each causing $DMG water damage. Causes a snare condition.

ranks.description: Casts multiple ice needles, each causing $DMG water damage. Causes a snare condition.

Strength_Mastery.name: Strength Mastery
Strength_Mastery.description: Enhances charge and jump attacking with strength weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons. Additionally adds a 16% damage bonus towards strength weapons.

ranks.description: Enhances charge and jump attacking with strength weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons. Additionally adds a 16% damage bonus towards strength weapons.

Dexterity_Mastery.name: Dexterity Mastery
Dexterity_Mastery.description: Enhances charge and jump attacking with dexterity weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons. Additionally adds a 18% damage bonus towards dexterity weapons.

ranks.description: Enhances charge and jump attacking with dexterity weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons. Additionally adds a 18% damage bonus towards dexterity weapons.

Sturdy.name: Sturdy
Sturdy.description: Provides a boon condition that grants immunity to knockback and auto parries incoming attacks.

ranks.description: Provides a boon condition that grants immunity to knockback and auto parries incoming attacks.

Multi_Bash.name: Multi Bash
Multi_Bash.description: Multihits adjacent targets in front of the caster, dealing $DMG up to four times. Cannot be evaded.

ranks.description: Multihits adjacent targets in front of the caster, dealing $DMG up to four times. Cannot be evaded.

Life_Tap.name: Life Tap
Life_Tap.description: Fully replenishes the casters mana at the cost of 40% of their maximum health.

ranks.description: Fully replenishes the casters mana at the cost of 40% of their maximum health.

Gust.name: Gust
Gust.description: Sends off a glyph of wind magic in front of the caster, greatly knocking back targets when hit. Deals $DMG nature damage.

ranks.description: Sends off a glyph of wind magic in front of the caster, greatly knocking back targets when hit. Deals $DMG nature damage.

Rock_Toss.name: Rock Toss
Rock_Toss.description: Tosses a rock, dealing $DMG damage and generating high threat.

ranks.description: Tosses a rock, dealing $DMG damage and generating high threat.

Mind_Mastery.name: Mind Mastery
Mind_Mastery.description: Enhances charge attacking with mind weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons. Additionally adds a 12% damage bonus towards mind weapons.

ranks.description: Enhances charge attacking with mind weapons. Does not effect transmuted weapons. Additionally adds a 12% damage bonus towards mind weapons.

Alacrity.name: Alacrity
Alacrity.description: Applies a clearcast boon. The next cast will be instant with no mana, health or stamina cost.

ranks.description: Applies a clearcast boon. The next cast will be instant with no mana, health or stamina cost.

Focus_Shot.name: Focus Shot
Focus_Shot.description: Fires a focused piercing shot that goes through targets, dealing $DMG damage. Cannot be evaded.

ranks.description: Fires a focused piercing shot that goes through targets, dealing $DMG damage. Cannot be evaded.

Spire.name: Spire
Spire.description: Molds the surface into a row of nine spires, dealing $DMG earth damage each. Can cause a bleeding condition on hit.

ranks.description: Molds the surface into a row of nine spires, dealing $DMG earth damage each. Can cause a bleeding condition on hit.

Fira.name: Fira
Fira.description: Casts three bolts of fire at once that deals $DMG fire damage. The first two bolts fire forward, while the third bolt circles around the caster.

ranks.description: Casts three bolts of fire at once that deals $DMG fire damage. The first two bolts fire forward, while the third bolt circles around the caster.
